attributes.action: use our taxes to help poor in africa not waste it on the olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I object to you wasting my taxes on the olympics. Please do not use my hard earned taxes on this waste of money, instead re-direct the £9.3 billion to help those that need the money elsewhere in the world. You could actually do something worthwhile for once.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
